equivalent_height_dry¶

pycraf.atm.equivalent_height_dry(freq_grid, press)[source] [edit on github]¶

Equivalent height for dry air according to ITU-R P.676-10, Annex 2.2.

Parameters
freq_gridQuantity

Frequenciesat which to calculate line-width shapes [GHz]

pressQuantity

Total air pressure (dry + wet) [hPa]

Returns
h_dryQuantity

Equivalent height for dry air [km]
